script.dialog: This Unit has another set of information for the young Zaraden.
This Unit will now explain how to extract |C3|tetrid motes|C0| from monsters as efficiently as possible.
Otherwise referred to as |C3|earning a high score.|C0|
|wave|Oh, that sounds fun!
There are three important factors to consider when earning a high score.
|C3|First Factor:|C0| The simplest way to extract |C3|motes|C0| from a monster is by breaking off pieces of the monster.
Your love is powerful enough to break parts of monster's |C3|weapons|C0| and |C3|armor.
Not every monster has breakable parts, but many of them do.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Look for breakable parts on each monster and break them.
I think the monsters built up such defenses because they are afraid of love.
They     don't think they deserve any.
I'll show them that they do!
|C3|Second Factor:|C0| holding a |C3|love combo|C0| on a monster will prime |C3|motes|C0| for extraction.
The current |C3|love combo|C0| will be displayed as the white portion of the monster's |C3|fear bar.|C0|
A |C3|love combo|C0| will grow as long as love is continuously inflicted upon the monster.
If no love is inflicted for too long,  or   if your heart takes damage, then the monster will feel rejected and |C3|end the combo.
All primed |C3|motes|C0| are extracted the moment a |C3|love combo|C0| ends.
If a |C3|love combo|C0| is held for the entire battle, then it will become a |C3|full combo.|C0|
A |C3|full combo|C0| will extract the optimal amount of |C3|motes|C0| that are possible via combo extractions.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Always get a |C3|full combo.|C0|
You make it sound so    easy.
|shake|Hey wait!
Sometimes a monster will fly somewhere that my heart can't reach.|!||L|I can't possibly keep a combo if that happens.
This is not a problem.
This Unit has observed that, under certain conditions, monsters will hold the |C3|love combo|C0| by themselves.
During this time, the |C3|love combo|C0| will turn yellow on the monster's |C3|fear bar.|C0|
Monsters will always hold the combo if they fly out of sight.
Some monsters will also hold the combo during certain attacks, or if they simply feel like it.
Why would they help me like that?
Perhaps the monsters do not wish to be rude.
|wave|They try to kill me so politely.
|C3|Third Factor:|C0| All extractions of any method will contain extra motes if you have an |C3|extraction bonus.|C0|
You will begin every battle with a |C3|25% extraction bonus.|C0|
This means that every single extraction will contain |C3|25% extra motes|C0| until your heart takes damage.
If your heart takes damage once, then the bonus will be reduced to a |C3|10% extraction bonus.|C0|
If your heart takes damage a second time, you will lose the |C3|extraction bonus|C0| for the rest of the battle.
If a |C3|love combo|C0| is ended by taking damage, then the previous bonus will still apply to that extraction.
I didn't realize there was so much math involved in love.
The important thing is that you avoid getting hit.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Do not get hit.
...Thanks, Little Robot.|!||L|I'll try not to get hurt.
Always remember the three factors for earning a high score.
|C3|Break all the monster parts.|L||!|Hold a full combo.|L||!|Don't get hit.
|wave|Thank you Little Robot.|!||L||norm|I'll try to keep this in mind.
And you must remember this.
|wave|I love you.
This Unit is running out of storage space for all this love.
